location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Copy of Colonel Kemball's letter to Secretary to Government Bombay about Koweit [Kuwait], Bahrein [Bahrain] and Aboo Eso [Yas Island]'

mods.abstract: Copy of letter No. 56 of 1866 from Colonel Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Political Agent in Turkish Arabia, Baghdad to the Secretary to Government of Bombay in the Political Department, Bombay written 26 June 1866.The Colonel's letter proposes that visits by the British India Steam Navigation Company to Koweit [Kuwait] should be suspended in order to protect the flourishing community there and enclosing communications from William Pears Johnston, British Agent at Bussorah [Basra] regarding Bahrein and a Persian offer of protection made to its Shaikh.
